sourcesContent:
import colors from "../../helpers/colors"

const styles = () => ({
    containerErrorMessage: {
        width: '100%',
        height: 'fit-content',
        backgroundColor: colors.red6,
        padding: 12,
        border: '1px solid ' + colors.red4,
        borderRadius: 6,
        fontSize: 12,
        color: colors.red4,
        overflowWrap: 'break-word',
    },
})

export default styles
